Text:
This is NTSC, anamorphic widescreen 16:9, great quality.  Audio in English, French, Spanish.  English subtitles.

Includes 2 disney short films in the special features, Clock Cleaners and Donald's Crime, which are very worth watching.

Thanks so much for this!

Thanks.
Hard to find anywhere else.
Thanks GREAT quality, my kids are going to love it
